remembering-api.value: Memory operations: remember(what, type, tags=[], conf=None) -> id; recall(search, n=10, tags=[], type=None) -> list; forget(id); supersede(old_id, summary, type) -> new_id. Types: decision, world, anomaly, experience. Config: config_get(key), config_set(key, value, category).

storage-rules.value: Write complete, searchable summaries that standalone without conversation context. Bad: 'User wants code'. Good: 'User prefers direct answers with code examples over lengthy explanations'. Always include type parameter.
